# Wave Forces

Wave forces on a body can be approximated using Morison’s equation:

$$
F(t) = \frac{1}{2} \rho C_d D |u(t)| u(t) + \rho C_m \frac{\pi D^2}{4} \dot{u}(t)
$$

Where:
- $\rho$ — water density  
- \(C_d\) — drag coefficient  
- \(C_m\) — inertia coefficient  
- \(D\) — body diameter  
- \(u(t)\) — fluid velocity  

Reference: {cite}`smith2020`.
